programme.title: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: A strict cop is on a mission to tame the widow of a drug boss, tracking her on the run through Texas, while simultaneously being deviated by corrupt police officers and armed thugs.(n)

programme.title: Drive Angry
programme.desc: John Milton is a grieving father who's chasing a demonic cult leader, who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter and wants to offer his granddaughter as a human sacrifice.(n)

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: When Secret Service agent Mike Banning is framed for attempting to assassinate the president, he escapes his agency and the FBI to uncover the real threat and stop them before itsts too late.(n)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: Paul and Audrey Safranek are a married couple who live in Omaha. Paul (played by Matt Damon) is a good-natured occupational therapist whose wife dreams of having a bigger house. Upon meeting their friends Dave and Carol Johnson who have downsized into 5 inches height, they learned that downsizing would increase the value of their assets by a 100 folds and will also reduce human waste and thus save the planet. After agreeing to downsize, Audrey backs out in the last moment and Paul realises that his problems will be getting bigger as he got smaller.(n)

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: The film follows the story of the African-American track and field athlete Jesse Owens, who was described as being the fastest man in the world, especially after his success in winning four gold medals in the 1936 Olympic Games that were held in Berlin during the period of the Nazi regime.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: The Expendables go on a mission presumed to be fairly easy, but it is far from. They face plenty of difficulties that result in a death, which lights a desire for revenge in their hearts from a killer who has enough platinum to change the power structure of the entire world.(n)

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: The story is about Mickey (Jennifer Aniston), the wife of corrupt businessman Frank (Tim Robbins), who gets kidnapped by criminals who extorted her husband and demanded a ransom. Things go against the expected.(n)

programme.title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Young FBI agent Henry Durand finds himself assigned to a tough task when he has to monitor his mother's boyfriend, who is an international art thief posing as a consultant.(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin finds himself tasked with transporting the Environmental Agency Minister's daughter under dangerous circumstances.(n)

programme.title: Happythankyoumoreplease
programme.desc: The film asks important questions about love, life and human relationships through a group of people living in New York. Like Sam who finds a lost boy on the subway, and his friend Annie who's looking for love.(n)

programme.title: The Big Wedding
programme.desc: A long-divorced dysfunctional pair have to fake being married for the duration of their adoptive son's wedding. Gathered under the same roof, family madness ensues.(n)

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: Feeling overwhelmed by the pressures of being an adult, Megan decides to take a break and hides at the house of a new teenager friend and her single father.(n)

programme.desc: Josh and Cornella Srebnick, a couple in their forties, living in New York City seem to have the perfect life. But their marriage and professional life are put to the test when two younger couples, Jamie and Darby, enter their lives.(n)

programme.title: Friends With Kids
programme.desc: For many years, Julie and Jason were close friends with no romantic feelings for each other. programme.desc: At the end of WWII, the desperate Nazis summon a creature from the depth of Hell to serve as a Nazi weapon. When US forces seize the half-blooded demon, Professor Trevor Bruttenholm takes him in and raises him to be a part of an elite supernatural team that defends the world against forces of evil.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the near future, a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes. Captain John Anderton, an officer from that unit, is himself accused of a future murder that will happen in the next 36 hours. What makes the situation worse, is that Anderton doesn't even know the victim.(n)

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.(n)

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: On their way home, the crew of a commercial spaceship responds to a distress call from an alien vessel, and when they land there, they find themselves trapped with an unknown organism that attaches itself to one of them.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.(n)

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: An evil dwarf penetrates the world between humans and mythical creatures, who declare war against the human race. A secret mission is planned to release the Golden Army, that is made up of a great number of strange and vicious creatures. Hellboy and his team are summoned to stop them and save humanity.(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Robin Longstride along with his band of his mercenaries set out to unite the people of England to stand up to the invading French forces led by King Philip.(n)

programme.title: Echo Boomers
programme.desc: In an attempt to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted, a group of college graduates goes on a destructive spree as they rob Chicago's richest while sending a message to the world.(n)

programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.(n)

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The beautiful Snow White gets into a fierce conflict with the Evil Queen. The Huntsman tries to train her to withstand these evil forces, but is it enough for her to defeat them.(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a last ditch effort to stop Memnon from taking over the world, the leaders of the remaining free tribes hire the assassin Mathayus to kill Cassandra, whom Menmon depends on to foretell his great victoies.(n)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: The story of two detectives, Sonny Crocket and Ricardo Tubbs, who are investigating a crime and somehow end up having their personal lives affected by their professional lives.(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: Frank Dux spent most of his life training to participate in the most important martial arts tournament in the world,where participants may lose their lives. Frank goes to the tournament despite the rejection of his army bosses, not afraid to face the fierce champion who's defending his title.(n)

Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.(n)

programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.(n)

programme.title: Crooked House
programme.desc: A detective story where the spy-turned-detective Charles is called upon to investigate the murder of his ex-lover's grandfather, as a web of lies unravels and suspecions hover around in the crooked family house.(n)

programme.title: Made in China
programme.desc: Years after moving away from his family, François decides to reconnect with them when he finds out that he will become a father. He tries to find that truth about his origins while dealing with his father and brother.(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: The 15:17 to Paris
programme.desc: A group of American soldiers discover a terrorist plot on a train to Paris and begin to fight terrorists.(n)

programme.desc: In the wake of Ragnar Lothbrok's death, his sons split up after they avenge him. Two of them sail to the Mediterranean Sea as the rest stay behind to jointly rule their land in East Anglia. But trouble is on the horizon as the brothers are pitted against each other.(n)
When his unit accidentally abandons him following a terrifying riot on the streets of Belfast in 1971, a new recruit to the British Army finds himself on his own as he tries to make it out alive.(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: An elderly thief, Nick Wells, is planning to retire and live off his accumulated wealth, but his mentor talks him into one last heist, which puts him at odds with the young crook Jackie.(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A story about a married couple in the 1950's and their personal struggles that affect their relationship after marriage.(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: When veteran catcher Crash Davis is sent to teach rookie pitcher Ebby Calvin about the game to get him ready for playing in the major leagues, baseball groupie Annie Savoy romances Ebby while also falling for Crash.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male Nurse Greg Focker, who wants to commit to his girlfriend, Pam. Greg is shocked to learn that her father is conservative, and that he has to get his approval first. He goes to spend the weekend with her parents, but it seems that Jack doesn't like him, and belittles him throughout his stay. Greg then discovers that Jack is a retired CIA agent.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: With a skilled jewel thief on the loose, Inspector Clouseau manages to identify the site of his next hit and sets out to try to stop him before he steals the priceless diamond known as "The Pink Panther".(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: An eccentric professor invents strange and funny machines that ultimately do not meet his purpose. He invents a revolutionary car, which attracts the attention of a foreign government that uses trickery to get its hands on the car.(n)

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.(n)

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: In South California, Benjamin and his family move to a new house with an adjoining zoo that needs repairs and renovations. With the help of the zoo's employees and some other people, they manage to renovate and open the zoo to the public.(n)

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: The documentary revolves around the iconic boxing champion Muhammad Ali, as it depicts his rise from a poor boy to being a worldwide legend and becoming an influential social activist in his community after retirement.(n)

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: The documentary revolves around the iconic boxing champion Muhammad Ali, as it depicts his rise from a poor boy to being a worldwide legend and becoming an influential social activist in his community after retirement.(n)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman, an employee of the insurance company, lives a normal life, in which the same situations are repeated on a daily basis. Despite his quiet life with his beautiful wife, Truman always feels something is missing. Truman wants to travel and roam the world, but obstacles always stand in his way. Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Wigand, an official at one of the largest tobacco companies, is faced with tough choices, either revealing dangerous secrets of the Tobacco industry through the TV program "60 Minutes", threatening to jeopardize his health insurance and family conditions, or to remain silent and violating his conscience.(n)

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: Mattie, a stubborn young girl hires a retired Marshal to track down her father's murderer and takes revenge.(n)

programme.title: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
programme.desc: Two lifelong buddies try to help their friend after they know that the bank is going to foreclose his bar and set up a new branch instead. They decide to rob the bank, but they get into big trouble.(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: With his personal life in a shambles, Detective Frank Keller is assigned to hunt down a serial killer, only to find himself falling for the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: Walk Of Shame
programme.desc: After a hard day, a reporter tries to get out of her funk by going out drinking and having a one-night-stand. But the next morning, she finds that this night of fun may jeopardize her lifelong dream as she gets stranded with no way to go to the most important job interview of her life.(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Sent for a loathed assignment in the town of Punxsutawney, a self-centered weatherman finds himself stuck in a time loop as he relives the town's annual Groundhog Day festivities over and over again.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: After a famous soccer player was killed during a match , and his ring known as the Pink Panther gets stolen, the chief of investigations (Dreyfus) appoints the worst police inspector (Clouseau) for the case, while he uses his best men to hunt down the murderer and thief.(n)

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.(n)

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: After a confrontation on the road, a single mother and her son find themselves stalked by a deranged man who's hellbent on teaching them fatal lessons.(n)

programme.title: Possessor
programme.desc: As a part of an organization that uses technology to take over people's bodies and force them to commit murder, Tasya Vos soon finds herself crumbling under the mental strain, which threatens to leave her stranded in the mind of one of those possessed, with the possible loss of her own identity.(n)

programme.title: The Titan
programme.desc: With Earth slowly becoming inhabitable, humanity has started looking to space for a new place to live. An experiment is launched to manage human evolution in a way that adapts to a new life in space, but tampering with evolution comes at a steep price.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.(n)

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: After being hired by an opulent family to design the ladies' attire for a forthcoming charity event that the family is organizing, Cindy ends up meeting a prince who falls for her.(n)

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.(n)

programme.title: 2 Hearts
programme.desc: The story of two couples from different times whose lives are intertwined by a special connection that will forever change their fates.(n)

programme.title: Cheerleader Abduction
programme.desc: Olivia is a bright student and head of her school's cheerleading team who's harboring a scandalous secret. As Olivia starts pulling away from her mother, the latter grows concerned and sets about trying to get to the bottom of the matter, uncovering a shocking truth.(n)

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.(n)

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.(n)

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.(n)

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.(n)

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2015 film (Sicario), where the drug war on the US-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border.(n)

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, a parolee goes back to his old ways as he reunites his old crew to recover money that was stolen during a botched DEA raid. However, they have to work to evade the retired sheriff pursuing them.(n)

programme.title: Truly, Madly, Sweetly
programme.desc: When a sudden inheritance brings them together, Natalie and Eric connect while renovating the historical bakery they inherited in the hope to kickstart a flourishing business. But despite their obvious feelings, Natalie remains hesitant to change their relationship from professional to romantic.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Secrets in the Woods
programme.desc: While on a romantic trip with her boyfriend in the woods, Sandra uncovers a dark secret about his father.(n)

programme.title: Love in Winterland
programme.desc: As Ally competes on a dating show, she returns to her hometown of Winterland, where she has to face her high school sweetheart, while dealing with the charming bachelor from the show.(n)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: The Ice Road

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Bodyguard Michael Bryce finds himself embroiled in a new dangerous mission, as he teams up with hitman Darius Kincaid and his wife Sonia in order to thwart a cyberattack in Europe.(n)

programme.title: Spiral
programme.desc: In this new chapter in the book of SAW, Detective Zeke Banks and his partner are investigating a series of murders that bear strong similarities to the gruesome crimes carried out by the evil Jigsaw, as Zeke becomes trapped in the killer's sick game.(n)

programme.title: Relish
programme.desc: A private treatment facility unites a group of troubled teenagers as they plan an escape to attend a music festival, an endeavor that sees a bond growing between them as they embark on an unexpected adventure.(n)

programme.title: Brutal Bridesmaids
programme.desc: As the soon-to-be bride Jessica begins to notice strange occurrences that are happening to her, she suspects that one of her bridesmaids is behind it.(n)

programme.title: American Utopia
programme.desc: A live recording of rock musician David Byrne's Broadway show, American Utopia, which is based on his album of the same name, featuring a number of accompanying singers and musicians.(n)

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When landing a job at her idol's restaurant doesn't turn out to be the dream Nikki thought it would, she embarks on a new journey with her idol's executive chef, who was unfairly fired alongside her, to open an eatery and develop new recipes that challenge her celebrity idol's own reign.(n)

But his life changes when he finds a magical potion that makes him amazing in everything for one day. He decides to use it to change his father's opinion about him and teach his bullies a lesson.(n)

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Three siblings find themselves alone on the island of Spitsbergen, where they must join hands to survive a severe snowstorm on one hand and predator bears on the other.(n)

programme.title: Marco Macaco (Primates of the Caribbean)
programme.desc: Marco Macaco works as a beach officer and loves the beautiful Lulu, who's fascinated by Marco's rival, Carlo, who builds a gigantic monkey-shaped casino on Marco's beach. Marco discovers Carlo's evil plans and tries to stop him.(n)

programme.title: Krazzy Planet
programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attemptpt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.(n)

programme.title: Bamse and the Thief City
programme.desc: The most popular Swedish comic book character gets his first feature film. The world's strongest bear Bamse and his friends Little Hopp and Shellman prove that friendship is the best weapon against evil.(n)

programme.title: Nur And The Dragon Temple
programme.desc: Nur and her parents move to China, where she makes new friends. While they're celebrating Guo's birthday in an amusement park, they discover that their friend is missing and they have to cross a maze and go through the nine gates of the dragon to find him.(n)

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As the last of the Air Nomads, Aang, who is also an Avatar who can master the art of bending all elements, embarks on a journey to master Waterbending with the help of siblings Sokka and Katara. On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.(n)

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.(n)

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: International spy Ethan Renner (Kevin Costner) decides to leave his risky life behind to build a stronger relationship with his daughter and wife. but Ethan has to complete one final mission before he retires , to catch the most dangerous terrorist in the world, while taking care of his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it in order to beat the game and return to the real world.(n)

programme.title: Two Graves
programme.desc: In the wake of her son's murder, a doctor teams up with a drug addict to capture the young man whom she believes is responsible for her recent loss. But as she tries to force a confession out of him through torture, hidden secrets come to the surface as tragedy strikes again.(n)

programme.title: Solis
programme.desc: When Troy Holloway is trapped in a drifting escape pod headed to the sun, he realizes that the problem he's in is much bigger than he thought, as the oxygen is rapidly running out, his chances of survival are quickly declining.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her efforts to destroy the Umbrella Corporation. She comes across a group of survivors who seek a sanctuary known as “Arcadia”, a safe-haven which was supposedly unaffected by the Zombie outbreak.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: 30 years after what happened in the first movie LAPD officer K finds a secret that could cause chaos to society. During his investigation he finds former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who was missing for 30 years.(n)

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: DC policeman Cale (Channing Tatum) is on a White House tour with his daughter when it is attacked by heavily armed paramilitary invaders. He must save his daughter and the President of the United States, though the odds are stacked against him.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.(n)
